summary: TAKATA RECALL  TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN I HAVE BEEN GETTING THE RUN AROUND FROM THOMAS TOYOTA IN JOLIET ILLINOIS ABOUT GETTING THE RECALL CALL DONE ON MY MOTHER IN LAWS CAR,RECALL NO. 16V-340 & 17V-006, SINCE I HAVE GOTTEN THE SAFETY RECALL LETTER FROM YOU FOLKS I HAVE MADE NUMEROUS ATTEMPTS TO GET THE CAR IN THERE AND KEEP GETTING EXCUSE AFTER EXCUSE ABOUT WHY THEY CANT DO IT, IF THE DEFECTIVE AIRBAG SHOULD DEPLOY BEFORE THE FIX YOU CAN BE ASSURED THAT I WILL BE CONTACTING A LAWYER AND A LAWSUIT WILL BE FILED AND ALL PARTIES INVOLVED WILL BE GETTING SUED, ALL I WANT IS THE PROBLEM FIXED WITHOUT THE EXCUSES INVOLVED, BRIAN THE ASST. PARTS MANAGER THERE SAID THAT THE PARTS NEEDED TO FIX THE CAR WILL NOT BE IN UNTIL DECEMBER 2017, AND I CAN NOT LET THE CAR SIT THAT LONG FOR THE REPAIR AS IT IS MY DAILY DRIVER, AGAIN ALL I WANT IS IT TO BE FIXED AND HAVE BEEN GETTING THE RUN AROUND AND THERE IS NO NEED FOR IT, I HAVE BEEN GOING AROUND WITH THIS SINCE MAY AND AGAIN THERE IS NO EXCUSE FOR IT
